name: Shot In The Dark (itch) (Cool Steel Breeze)
name_original: Shot In The Dark (itch) (Cool Steel Breeze)
description:
A 4-Player Platform Fighter.

(XBox Controllers are HIGHLY recommended).

(Because I left the zip folder named as "86x" in an attempt to get it out quick, it may show a false warning when downloading).

The goal of the game is to get the glowing orb and stay in the light for as long as possible. You can pick up the orb by walking into it and throw it to keep it away. You can also punch players holding the orb to send it flying out of their hands. Whoever has the highest score when the countdown ends wins.

Player 1 Control

Move- Arrow Keys

Punch/Throw - Numpad 0

Jump - Right CTRL

Player 2 Control

Move - WASD

Punch -C

Jump -Left CTRL

Player 3 Control

Move - IJKL

Punch -P

Jump -Spacebar

Player 4 Control

Move - 8456 NUMPAD

Punch -Numpad +

Jump -Numpad -

(I was running out of keyboard space...)

Resources

Sound Effects: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

TileSet: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset

Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise
